str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From energes; to be active, efficient.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
